<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Updates the profile of a passport"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"patch"}
  path={"/passport_profiles/{passport_id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates the profile of a passport

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"passport_id","in":"path","description":"Passport id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"X-API-KEY","in":"header","description":"Your Talent Protocol API key","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"AUTHORIZATION","in":"header","description":"Your auth token","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"passport_profile":{"type":"object","properties":{"display_name":{"type":"string","description":"The display name of the passport"},"bio":{"type":"string","description":"The bio of the passport"},"tags":{"type":"string","description":"The tags of the passport"},"location":{"type":"string","format":"datetime","description":"The location of the passport"}}}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"profile updated","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"passport_profile":{"type":"object","properties":{"bio":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"The bio of the passport"},"display_name":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"The display name of the passport"},"location":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"The location of the passport"},"tags":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","description":"A tag describing the passport profile"}}}}}}}}},"401":{"description":"unauthorized request"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
